text:
The Trump administration repeatedly withheld COVID-19 emergency relief funds that Congress directed to Tribal Nations. Meanwhile, the pandemic ravaged Native communities. The administration’s actions to delay funding to Tribal Nations is disgraceful.
https://t.co/yE0aDiE3k1
